siteMetadata.title: vwa.la help
siteMetadata.description: Everything you need to know about the vwa.la influencer marketing platform.

ghostPost.title: Do you offer student, open source developer, or non-profit discounts?
ghostPost.excerpt:
We offer a 20% discount  on all plans [https://ghost.org/pricing]  which are
pre-paid annually. We're a non-profit ourselves, so unfortunately we aren't able
to discount our services beyond that. The good news is that the entire codebase
is free and open source, so you can self-host it on your own server!

Ghost(Pro)  is the sole source of funding for the open source project, which is
how we’re able to improve Ghost and build new features.
ghostPost.meta_title: Are there any Ghost(Pro) discounts? - FAQ
ghostPost.meta_description: For the premium hosted service, we offer a 20% discount on all annual plans. Ghost(Pro) is a non-profit and the entire codebase is free and open source.

ghostPost.html:
We offer a 20% discount on all plans which are pre-paid annually. We're a non-profit ourselves, so unfortunately we aren't able to discount our services beyond that. The good news is that the entire codebase is free and open source, so you can self-host it on your own server!

Ghost(Pro) is the sole source of funding for the open source project, which is how we’re able to improve Ghost and build new features.
